description:
Please leave the operation  to the fellow passenger. Use of NavigatorX is at the user’s own risk. 
Navigate your drive. The advertisement is displayed.
The navigation on landscape orientation is available. 
NavigatorX can search and display the route and instructions ,and provide the simple navigation. Searched route is available for driving, walk, biking(only support for US.) . Moved track can be displayed. Also the waypoints can be defined up to 8 points. 
Street View available.You can show the streetview nearby Start-Point, End-Point and waypoint tapping on the icon which is on the left of the cell. 
The NavigatorX automatically re-route off-route.
You can save  and backup the points of interest.
The wayPoint can be saved as POI.
The alarm sounds at about 400m from the landmark. 
The Long press of a double-tap can display the pop-up menu instead of long press of a single-tap. 

Improving Place searching. You can search the places that are near a displayed location. Search keys (bank, subway station, store etc.) are available.

 You can select the update timming of a location, 1sec, 3sec, 10 sec.
The blue dot icon on the right top of search icon indicates that the precision of GPS is lower than the off-route distance and the auto-reroute is available. The red dot indicates that the precision of GPS is low and the auto-reroute is suspended.
Tracking of current location is turned off for 10 seconds if you move the map during the 
The add-on:No iAd
 This new add-on disables the iAd advertisements. 

The add-on:Plus
The navigation functions are improved without advertisement. Cross road view, alarm sound and saving data are added. You can save the searched route and tracked data.
The approaching reminder can set up at 100m and 500m.

Approaching Notification: In Settings You can define the approaching points from saved POIs and the file named “alarm.dat. 
You should add the group of approching notification points at first. The On/Off of the notification is indivisualy managed by the group. You can enable the notification of group tapping the row of the group.
“alarm.dat” file should be placed at top directory by iTunes  file sharering.
The file format is follows,
latitude, longitude, name of point, approaching angle
Example:
26.2544725,127.7238384,apple head quater,180
Multiple line is available.
The approaching angle is measured clockwise from the north.

Notes:Please pay attention to the remaining amount of the battery. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life in similar to foreground.

BecomingSystems specifically disclaims any and all liability, including without limitation, consequential and incidental damages, that may arise in any way from the use of or reliance on the NavigatorX application.
releaseNotes:
Fix the bug about the crash setting of start/end point for iOS7 on Japanese language.
The list/play/delete of recorded videos are available for free version.
Bug fix about Map type change on iOS8/traffic view button
other bugs fix
